summary: This bill, the Dayton National Cemetery Expansion Act of 2025, authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to acquire approximately 58 acres of land in Dayton, Ohio, from the Montgomery County Land Bank for the expansion of the Dayton National Cemetery. The Land Bank will transfer the land at no cost to the Department, which must accept the transfer within three years of the offer. The bill specifies the parcel's location and clarifies that it does not mandate acquiring other parcels, nor does it encourage special agreements with entities other than the Land Bank.
